languages.text: Wielder gains +10 to all stats on first kill per round until the end of this round.

traits.locale_text: Wielder gains +10 to all stats on first kill per round until the end of this round.

languages.text: When the wearer kills a target the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the round.
languages.original_text: Убив цель впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, персонаж получает +10 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца раунда.

traits.locale_text: When the wearer kills the target for the first time in a round, they gain +10 to all characteristics until the end of round.
When the wearer kills a target the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the round.

languages.text: Takan kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} ilk kez bir hedefi öldürürse tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +10 kazanır. Bu etki, raunt sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills a target the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the round.

traits.locale_text: Takan kişi, bir rauntta ilk kez bir hedefi öldürürse tüm niteliklerine +10 kazanır. Bu etki, raunt sonuna dek sürer.

languages.text: Cuando el portador mata a un objetivo por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, obtiene +10 para todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del asalto.
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills a target the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the round.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador mata a un objetivo por primera vez en un asalto, obtiene +10 para todas sus características hasta el final del asalto.

languages.text: 当装备者每轮中首次击杀目标时，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高10点，效果持续至本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}结束。
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills a target the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the round.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者每轮中首次击杀目标时，所有属性提高10点，效果持续至本轮结束。

languages.text: Wenn der Träger zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} ein Ziel tötet, erhält er bis zum Ende der Runde +10 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills a target the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the round.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger zum ersten Mal in einer Runde ein Ziel tötet, erhält er bis zum Ende der Runde +10 auf alle Eigenschaften.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le porteur tue une cible pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il gagne +10 à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} jusqu'à la fin du round.
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills a target the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the round.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le porteur tue une cible pour la première fois au cours d'un round, il gagne +10 à toutes les caractéristiques jusqu'à la fin du round.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で初めてターゲットを倒すと、ラウンド終了まですべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が+10される。
languages.original_text: When the wearer kills a target the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the round.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がラウンドで初めてターゲットを倒すと、ラウンド終了まですべての特性が+10される。
